name: Unstable Sky City
description:
GAMEPLAY:

So, here we are !

They called you a madman for trying to settle on this hell of a rock but it only took you four thrusters, a big boulder and a small loan form your grandmother to build an highly attractive paradise !

However, the stabilization is still manual. With the neverending waves of colons constantly destabilizing our new eden, you are more important than ever !

Use the four sliders in front of you to control the power of the four different thrusters. 

In the middle, our rotation and vertical speeds are indicated.

Be careful ! The city is a litteral boulder, so it is heavy and slow.

Avoid the lava, avoid tilting us and avoid air pockets !

Good luck ! A lava mojito is waiting for me in our new bar !

CONTEXT:

Made for the Trijam 161: Pressure Rises in around 7h.

This is my third submission overall so I hope you will like it !

My personal highscore is 2579 !

The idea, gameplay and programmation are mine, using unity and bolt.

The music and sprites are copyright free assets.

Was sadly unable to make it work as an HTML file. Maybe due to Bolt.
